tweets.text: @tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink This morning is toxic the EA don't give a shit and the only action is to talk more and debate ho and put some extra monitoring stations up for data.  Correct me if I'm wrong thousands of newcastle residents telling them they are polluting the air we breathe isn't good enough?
@tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink Been here for a few months unfortunately. Reported to EA the other day.

@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @tayz_BETH @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink Do you have a map we can share? Agree it would help drive home the extent of the problem.

tweets.text: In Newcastle under Lyme @NewsNBC the air & environment is toxic,we are sick physically & mentally, as this is acceptable where should we leave the dead? Who is responsible? @DefraGovUK @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/8BOUhNZror

Today the team have worked with @EnvAgency & @AnglingTrust at #Hanningfieldresevoir to check for poaching & theft offences. Multiple licences checked with persons reported for not having rod licences. A good day of partnership working despite the üåß. @PCJedRaven https://t.co/YaM7cTVF1e
@tw33tie1 @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Exactly, that‚Äôs why a map of where it‚Äôs being detected might help to highlight the extent of the problem.

@SouthernWater @OurWestgate @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @SirRogerGale @TransportActio2 @ELF_Law @KentHighways Thanks I will DM you but this shows my concern. The water will be contaminated from the road so sending it into Agricultural land on the aquifer is not sensible in my view. The volume of houses due will make this a whole lot worse in #thanet.@EnvAgency https://t.co/ZUwJi9wx4X
@Evsthetractor @kernowbeaver @EllieChowns @EnvAgency From the photo, I know exactly where it is and it‚Äôs not near a stables.

@tayz_BETH @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink It looks more horrific when seen as a map. Their stance of innocence is nothing less than astounding. What does it actually take for the authorities to wake up and see the untold damage this is causing?
@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice you have to act you are responsible.

@riversideros @OurWestgate @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @SirRogerGale @TransportActio2 @ELF_Law @KentHighways Hi Ros, Can you please DM me with the address for where this is happening so we can pass the query on?

This whole issue is beginning to stink as much as the sewage @YorkshireWater dump into the #RiverWharfe

Wouldn‚Äôt that be right @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/HUuKyDMjqL

So the new chairman of The Wharfe Partnership, which deliberately excludes @CleanIlkley, has acted as a paid consultant to @Defra, @ThamesWater, @stwater, @wessexwater, @DwrCymru, @YorkshireWater and the @EnvAgency 

No conflict of interest there then?

https://t.co/DgGZQkXP5K

@poppers82 @tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink I've just driven down the D road and it was absolutely vile around the A34 turnoff and then noticeable until Wolstanton . tweets.text: @davemh72 @poppers82 @tayz_BETH @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @stopthestink It all depends on the wind direction. When it‚Äôs not in your home: the wind is carrying it away and into someone else‚Äôs home, be it 1 or 6 miles away. The toxic stench is always there. WE MUST NEVER FORGET THIS. So basically...If I sleep well  some other poor soul is not! Unite...

Can I also add they have deliveries from well outside the local area such as north Wales and Manchester which have massively polluting lorries carrying all that stuff . @EnvAgencyMids have allowed them to increase the number of lorries and the tonnage to increase from 250,000

@annjsmall @HelenVi00175623 @richbeanjohnson @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency I can't smell it , however the damage is done I'm still awake every morning  2 am onwards,  breathless , migraine  due to windows closed and vents.  Medical condition exacerbated. Mental health also rocketed. Living in fear off when the toxicity appears. Long term symptoms 5 mth.

tweets.text: Tomorrow @BBCCountryfile reveals the mass housing freeze across England. This includes the protected Wye, where @EnvAgency believes c.60% of the phosphates pollution problem is down to diffuse agriculture. New homes a fraction of nutrient loading yet the sector here is closed. https://t.co/bbI9aq9crS

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

@Malvernmeet @stushurlock @RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency We all have a responsibility to reduce plastic waste - absolutely.
